attributes.action: Review the Management Structure in the Tax Office Element of HMRC.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament to hold a Public enquiry into the recent shambles that has been created by the Tax Office heirarchy whereby elderly people are being threatened with a variety of heavy handed intimidation deeds to recover recently discovered underpayments of a few pounds tax whilst at least two multi-national companies have agreed with the Tax office to have billions written off. It is time that this Department was regulated and in keeping with other Government Departments.
